items.question: Do I need to create an account to use the voice recorder?
items.answer: No account required! You can start recording immediately without any registration or login process.

items.question: Is my audio data safe and private?
items.answer: Absolutely. All recording and processing happens locally in your browser. Your audio never leaves your device unless you choose to download it.

items.question: What audio format does the recorder export?
items.answer: The recorder exports high-quality WAV files, which are compatible with all audio editing software and provide the best sound quality.

items.question: Why can't I hear anything or see the waveform moving?
items.answer: Make sure you've granted microphone permissions and check that your microphone is working. Try speaking closer to your microphone or adjusting your system's input volume.

items.question: Can I use this on my phone or tablet?
items.answer: Yes! The voice recorder works on iOS Safari, Android Chrome, and other modern mobile browsers with microphone support.

items.question: How can I improve the quality of my recordings?
items.answer: For best results, record in a quiet environment close to your microphone. After recording, you can use our Audio Enhancer tool to remove background noise and improve clarity.

items.question: Is there a time limit for recordings?
items.answer: There's no artificial time limit, but very long recordings may be limited by your browser's available memory. For extended recordings, consider recording in segments.

items.question: Can I edit my recordings after recording?
items.answer: The recorder focuses on high-quality capture. For editing, download your WAV file and use audio editing software, or try our Audio Enhancer for noise reduction and quality improvements.
